text:
Sensor Tower | San Francisco, CA | Full-Time, Onsite | https://sensortower.com

Sensor Tower provides key metrics for mobile app developers so that they can focus on growing their user base, downloads, and revenue (and leave the numbers to us). If you have a mobile app, think of us as being your compass. We're hiring for all roles.

To learn more about who we are, our engineering culture, and whether this is the right place for you, read our Key Values profile: https://www.keyvalues.com/sensor-tower

Here are our open roles:

- Senior Product Engineer, Data: https://jobs.lever.co/sensortower/7442e664-c7ff-4221-8ac7-6e...

- Senior Full Stack Engineer: https://jobs.lever.co/sensortower/c171234a-4906-46c3-b609-7d...

- Senior Data Scientist: https://jobs.lever.co/sensortower/7eb5e065-4107-4bc9-85b5-99...

- Director of Engineering: https://jobs.lever.co/sensortower/5d633b40-e089-4b81-8f78-8d...

Tech Stack: Rails | MongoDB | Knockout

If you're interested or have questions, email: jobs [at] sensortower [dot] com
